high_descs: Turn around and go to the toilet behind yo.
Pick up the roll of toilet paper on the back of the toilet.
Move over to the toilet paper holder, on the wall, to the left of the toilet.
Place the roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder, hanging from the wall.
anns.task_desc: Put a roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper dispenser.

high_descs: Turn right and take one step, then turn right to face the toilet.
Pick up the toilet paper on top of the toilet.
Place the toilet paper on the holder that is on the wall.
anns.task_desc: To put the toilet paper away.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the left side of the white toilet.
Pick up the full roll of toilet paper from the left side of the toilet tank.
Look up at the metal bar of the holder on the wall to the left of the toilet.
Put the full roll of toilet paper on the metal bar of the holder.
anns.task_desc: Place a full toilet paper roll on a metal holder.
